Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1992
Subject: Progress of Alex S. Gonzalez
Dear Sir,
Alex S. Gonzalez has an AVG of .346 at A Clearwater Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1992
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Todd Worrell

Regards,
